data.text: “Ɛdeɛn na mowɔ tia me, Ao Tiro ne Sidon ne mo Filistia amantam nyinaa? Mopɛ sɛ motɔ me so awere anaa? Sɛ saa na ɛte deɛ a, monhwɛ yie. Mɛyɛ ntɛm, atua mo biribiara a moayɛ no so ka.
Mofaa me dwetɛ ne me sikakɔkɔɔ ne mʼagyapadeɛ a ɛsom bo, na mosoa kɔguu mo abosonnan mu.
Motontɔn nnipa a wɔte Yuda ne Yerusalem maa Helafoɔ3.6 Helafoɔ ne Foenikefoɔ dii dwa firi afe 800 A.W.A. sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, wɔbɛfiri wɔn asase so akɔ akyirikyiri.
“Nanso, mɛsane de wɔn afiri baabi a mokɔtɔn wɔn no aba, na deɛ moayɛ no nyinaa, mɛtua mo so ka.
Mɛtontɔn mo mmammarima ne mo mmammaa ama Yudafoɔ, na wɔn nso atɔn wɔn ama Arabfoɔ, ɔman a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri no.” Me, Awurade, na makasa.
Mo mpae mu nka yei wɔ aman so:
Momfa mo mfuntumdadeɛ no mmɔ akofena,
“Afei, wobɛhunu sɛ, me Awurade, wo Onyankopɔn,
“Saa ɛda no, nsã foforɔ bɛsɔne afiri mmepɔ no mu,
Na mogya afɔdie a memfa nkyɛeɛ no,
